2223.name: Entrance to the Great Hall
description: You have entered a huge hall.  It has been carefully decorated with
beautiful tapestries depicting a great battle between dragons and men.  The
dragons appear to be the victors.
You see the Nursery.
The Hall continues.

2229.name: Great Hall Ends
description: You have come to the end of the great hall.  You see before you a huge
golden door, it must be at least twenty feet tall!  It has beautiful etchings
of dragons.  You see a sign on the door.
You see the hall.
You see a great golden door.
Congratulations on making it this far!  Watch out, it gets a little
nasty here... :) - Wench

2220.name: Lair
description: You have entered a large room dominated by a great white dragon.  It growls
at you before it attacks.
You the cave opening.

2201.name: Tower Gates
description: You are at the entrance to a tall tower.  Lightning flashes periodically and
it is raining.  You think it might be a good idea to turn back into the grove.
You see a large steel gate.  Beyond is the Foyer of the Tower.
The shadows cloud your vision.
The gate is tall and secure.  Whoever built it values privacy.

2240.name: Path
description: This path leads up the side of the mountain.  A clearing lies below you.
There is a cave opening to the west.  The path continues up the mountain.
cave opening
the path continues
clearing

2224.name: Great Hall
description: You are working your way down the Hall.  To the north, you notice a smaller
passageway, while the main hall continues to the east.
You see a narrow passageway.
You see the Hall.

2212.name: Hall O' Pleasure
description: You stop dead in your tracks as you enter this ornately decorated room - it
is populated with the king's harem.
You see the Court.

2236.name: End of the tunnel
description: You have finally come to the end of the tunnel.  Back to the west lies
the miles of tunnels you have walked through.  You see the faint outline of
a trapdoor above you.  A bridge over an underground river lies to the south.
The tunnel
bridge
trapdoor

2234.name: Tunnel
description: This tunnel seems to stretch for miles.  You try to distinguish the end but
your eyes soon tire from the strain.  The smell here has increased two fold.
The tunnel continues to go to the east.  The wine cellar lies back to the
west.
A cave opening
A tunnel
A tunnel

2237.name: Bridge
description: You are walking along an old wooden bridge.  Its not that secure.  You
might want to hurry along.  To the south, on the other side of the bridge,
lies a small opening.
The tunnel end
A small opening

2222.name: Crypt Ends
description: You have come to the end of the Crypt.  It seems deserted.  There is a
strange coffin lying against the wall.
You see the Crypt.
A coffin lies a against the east wall.  It is closed.

2235.name: Cave opening
description: You stand at the opening of a giant cave.  There are many bones strewn across
the room.  Some human, some indistinguishable.  It smells very bad in here.
You can hear movement in the cave to the north.  The tunnel goes back to the
south.
The lair
The tunnel

2209.name: Treasure Room
description: You have made it past the hydra into the vault.  You are astounded by
the treasure here.  Not only are you now rich, you can probably rest here
safely.  The west wall seems to have a large door made entirely of ruby.
You see nothing special.
You see a ruby door!

2210.name: Second Floor
description: You have made it up to the second floor.  You hear hissing and see several
dragon men rushing you.  You wonder how long you will be staying here.
You see the court.
You see the first floor.

2218.name: Entrance to the Crypt
description: You have entered a large room which smells heavily of reptile.  You wonder
what awaits you here.
You see the Crypt.
You see the Treasure Vault.

2232.name: Stairwell
description: This is an old decrepit stairwell that leads to the wine cellar.  It looks
like it hasn't been used for decades.  Well, at least not by anything living.
The crypt
A wine cellar

2211.name: Court
description: You have entered what seems to be a large court.  The people guarding it
don't seem happy to see you ...
You see the court.
You see nothing special.
You see a wooden door.

2238.name: Small opening
description: You are standing in a small opening.  To the north lies the old wooden
bridge.  To your south the you can see a clearing.  You can see sunlight
again.  What a welcome relief!
bridge
clearing

2221.name: Lair
description: You have entered a large room dominated by a great black dragon.  It looks
as though it is amused by your presence.
You the cave opening.

2216.name: Court Ends
description: You have reached the end of the court.  A huge Draconian is sitting in a
chair here.  As you enter, he motions with his hand and you are rushed by three
of his bodyguards.
You see the court.
You see a private chamber.

2215.name: Sanctum
description: This small room is modestly decorated with small dragon icons.  Its sole
occupant is deep in thought.
You see the Court.

2228.name: Underground Tunnel
description: This tunnel has come to a dead end.  You feel nervous about being trapped here.
You see the tunnel.

2203.name: Hallway
description: This hallway seems to stretch on forever.  You notice a stairway in
the distance.
The hall continues.
You see the foyer.

2230.name: THE Lair
description: You have entered a huge lair.  You feel that something big lives here or at least did.  The golden door lies back to the west.
You see a great golden door.

2242.name: Path continues
description: The path continues up the mountain to the top.  The path also goes down.
Thats it, nothing more to see.
top of the mountain
path

2207.name: End of the Hallway
description: You have finally reached the end of the hallway.  A huge staircase leads up.
You see a sign at the base of the staircase.
The hall continues.
The second floor.
The sign reads:
This area is kind of tough.  You probably shouldn't go up these stairs
alone if you are under 18th level, or at all if you under 14th level.
Have fun! -- Wench

2226.name: Lair
description: You have entered a large lair with bones strewn about the ground.  You
notice the source of these as you come face to face with a rather large red
dragon.  You notice a trap door in the floor.
The narrow passageway.
You see a trap door.

2239.name: Clearing
description: You stand out in a clearing.  Mountains are all around you.  There is a
well in the middle of the clearing.  Lying against the well is a sign.  A
path leads up the mountain.  The small opening is back to the north.
the small opening
A path
The well
You peer over the side of the well.  It looks VERY, VERY deep.  It appears
to be ENDLESS.
The sign reads:
This is a bottomless pit cleverly disguised as a well.  People have
fallen in and never been heard from again.  Trust me, you don't want to go
down there.
The All Powerful Well Keeper

2231.name: End..
description: You have reached the final lair.  It is dominated by a huge five headed
dragon.  You suddenly realize that you have SERIOUS problems...
You see the top of the mountain.

2208.name: Guardian's Room
description: You climb down the rickety stairs and find yourself face to face with a
gargantuan hydra.  How fast can you climb UP stairs?
A large grey door.
You see the storage room.

2214.name: Library
description: You have entered a huge room, filled with books.  A peaceful man is
sitting at a table, studying.
You see the court.

2217.name: Bedroom
description: This is the personal room of the draconian king.  It is not empty.
You see Court.

2213.name: Court
description: You are continuing down the hall.  To the east and west you see ornate doors.
You see the court.
You see the court.
You see a white door.
You see a black door.

2227.name: Underground Tunnel
description: You have entered an underground tunnel.  It is dark and dirty, and you find
yourself wishing you were back in Westbridge.
You see the tunnel.
You see the red dragon's lair.

2233.name: Wine cellar
description: This is the old wine cellar of the Dragon Tower.  The shelves are empty.
Nothing living has been in here for a long time.  You see a tunnel leading
off to the east and boy does it smell bad.  Kinda of like rotting flesh.
A tunnel
The stairwell

2225.name: Narrow Passageway
description: This Passageway branches off from the main hall and leads somewhere ... where?
You see a large Lair.  It looks dangerous.
You see the great hall.

2202.name: Foyer
description: This is the entrance to the Tower.  The hallway continues to the north,
leading towards a staircase.  You notice a grim painting on the wall,  and
quickly look away.
You see a long hallway.
You see the gate.
This painting depicts the grisly death of a foolish human.  You hope you do
not share his fate.

2204.name: Hallway
description: You trudge down the hallway.  You notice doors to the east and west.
The hall continues.
The hall continues.
You see an oak door.  There is an inscription on it.
You see a door.  You notice a sign.
It says "STORAGE"
The sign says "NURSERY" in bold letters.

2219.name: Crypt
description: You are in a large room which continues to the west.  You notice many
coffins here.  Open coffins reveal remains of something other than man.
The smell of reptile is very strong here.
You see nothing special.
You see the entrance.

2243.name: Top of the mountain
description: You are standing at the top of the mountain.  It feels more like the top of
the world.  To your north lies a huge platinum door.  You hear very pronounced
grumbling from behind the doors.  It sounds like something huge and hungry.
But if you don't have the key you don't have to worry because you can't get in.
If you do have the key I would suggest not going in.  Some believe the Five
Headed dragon Tiamat was imprisoned here by the gods.  But who believes in
fairy tales.  Well, if you're scared, you can always go down the mountain.
The platinum door
The path continues
A huge platinum door separates you from harm

2205.name: Nursery
description: It looks like a tornado has been through here.  Toys are scattered everywhere,
and a small group of dragon hatchlings are fighting over a bone.
You see the hallway.
You see a large stone door.

2206.name: Storage Room
description: This room is covered with dust, it looks as if no one has been here in ages.
You see the hallway.
You see nothing special.
As you look closely at the dust, you notice the outline of a trapdoor!

2241.name: Cave opening
description: You stand before a huge cave opening.  You hearing heavy breathing from
within the cave.  There are a few skeletons lying about.  The cave lies to
the south.  The path is back to the east.
A lair
the path

2240.name: a Draconian zombie~
description:
This used to be one of the warriors of this tribe.  He was denied his final
rest, however, and now guards this corridor tirelessly as a zombie.
2240.room_name: A Draconian zombie is here, staring at nothing in particular.

2241.name: the phase dragon~
description: This small dragon looks like he's up to no good.
2241.room_name: A Phase Dragon is darting around the room.

2242.name: the draconian fool~
description:
This dragon man looks VERY foolish, dressed in a green and blue striped 
suit.  As you enter the room, he points at you and laughs.
2242.room_name: A Fool is here, making fun of you.

2243.name: the Draconian Queen~
description:
This draconian looks VERY busy as she orders her slaves around.  You think 
it might be a good idea to leave her alone.
2243.room_name: A Female Draconian sits, here, looking very important.

2220.name: Tiamat~
description:
You see before you the master of this Tower, Tiamat.  She frowns at you as she
prepares to make you pay for your insolence ... with your lives!
2220.room_name: A five headed dragon hisses at you as you enter this room.

2221.name: the Great Red Dragon~
description:
This huge red dragon dominates the chamber.  As you turn to flee, he grins at
you and invites you to stay ... forever!
2221.room_name: A red dragon is here, contemplating your existence.

2222.name: the Great Black Dragon~
description:
This huge black wyrm laughs at your puny weapons.  You realize that he is not
going to roll over and die for you.
subroutines:
F res H
F vul I
2222.room_name: A black dragon is here, laughing at your insolence.

2223.name: the Great White Dragon~
description:
This dragon towers over you.  Recalling your previous experiences with white
dragons, you are not afraid.  She smiles at you and says 'I think you will find
me a greater challenge than my offspring.'
subroutines:
F res H
F vul I
2223.room_name: A white dragon is here, waiting for you.

2225.name: the Ancient Green Dragon~
description:
This huge beast appears to be the most directly related to the draconians. 
She looks at you with sorrow in her eyes and says 'You have slaughtered my 
children.  Prepare to die.'
subroutines:
F res H
F vul I
2225.room_name: A green dragon is here, looking distraught.

2226.name: a large hydra~
description:
A hydra is here, guarding the entrance to a sealed vault.  You have the feeling
it isn't happy to see you.
2226.room_name: A hydra is here, blocking the doorway.

2227.name: A human slave~
description:
He looks like he's under a lot of stress.  He would probably like it if you
left him alone.
2227.room_name: A Human slave is here, hard at work.

2200.name: the dragon hatchling~
description:
This small dragon hisses at you as you enter the room.  Although it is only a
few feet long, its sharp teeth make you think twice about petting it.
subroutines:
F res H
F vul I
2200.room_name: A dragon hatchling is here, chewing on a bone.

2201.name: the Draconian~
description:
This horrible creature is a bizarre cross between a man and a dragon.  He 
has black scales and a seven foot wingspan.  He scowls at you and hefts his 
spear as you enter the room.

2202.name: the dragon master~
description: He doesn't look happy to see you.
2202.room_name: The lord of this crypt is here.

2203.name: a powerful mage~
description:
A powerful looking mage is standing in this room studying his spells.  You are
surprised at the fact that he is human, and realize that he must be very
powerful to have been accepted by the creatures which live here.
2203.room_name: A man is here, studying some books.

2204.name: the holy Draconian~
description:
A Draconian stands here, dressed in simple robes.  Around his neck you 
notice a golden medallion in the shape of a five headed dragon.
2204.room_name: A Draconian is here, deep in thought.

2205.name: the Draconian King~
description:
The king of the draconians sits here on a golden throne.  He looks as 
though he could crush your head with a single blow.  Yet you sense that he 
is controlled by a greater power.
2205.room_name: A Draconian wearing fine clothes is here, pondering his greatness.

2206.name: a concubine~
description:
This is a concubine of the king.  She is lounging here, wearing nothing at 
all.  You find yourself strangely repulsed as she draws a knife and 
prepares to defend herself.

2207.name: A bodyguard~
description:
This creature has devoted its life to defending the king.  Your intrusion has
not pleased it.
2207.room_name: A bodyguard is here, staring at you menacingly.
